titles.title: DRAIN THE SWAMP Act
Decentralizing and Reorganizing Agency Infrastructure Nation-wide To Harness Efficient Services, Workforce Administration, and Management Practices Act
DRAIN THE SWAMP Act

A bill to require the head of each Executive agency to relocate 30 percent of the employees assigned to the headquarters of the Executive agency to duty stations outside the Washington metropolitan area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
